reviews.review: I'll give this movie some credit because there are technically people who worked hard on this project in animation and voice acting. But this movie is ungodly horrible not just because it's a boring, cliche, lazy excuse for a movie, but because this movie actually changed the landscape of the entertainment industry, in the worst way possible. It lowered the bar for what soulless, cheap, product placement monstrosities could be accepted and made by massive entertainment studios. It's technically not the worst movie ever made but it's one of the most hate able movies ever, and it goes against everything that make movies great. Overall, it's a disgusting movie and you shouldn't give your money to the hacks who made it.
This was actually not that bad. OthErs seem to hate it by I liked it. At some points it did not make sense but that’s really all that sucked. Anyways overall this movie was pretty good.
Instead of trying to find something for all audiences [ To like ] They made something that all audiences find cringy, horrifyingly cringy.

This movie really was bad...I mean so bad at about the 20min mark I got so mad I started yelling as loud as I could. My family around me scared, but I could not stop myself. I smashed the tv in my yelling fit of rage. The tv could play no more of this god darn bad move. I got so mad after watching it I went outside of house and yelled at the first person walking by...this movie made me do it...I got so mad at the badness of this film.

Well, here is my review, I am a kid (11 years old), mostly, kids like any type of kiddie movie, we once had a movie showing at my school (The Emoji Movie) and 99% of my school like it, but not me, they don´t know they are watching a terrible movie, once they get what they saw, they are gonna feel so stupid by watching this crap, ITS TERRIBLE, THE STORY-LINE IS DOWNRIGHT AWFUL!!! ITS NOT FUNNY!!! PAY AN EXTRA 20$ AND GO ELSEWHERE OR YOU WILL REGRET IT!!!

EDIT: Had to give it half a star cause thats the least I can rate the movie.
The worst movie off al time
Big doo doo with feminist emoji. Has very small brain and big dummy dumb. It gave me cancer.
I'm so sorry the lowest I could give it is half a star
(s) This is quite literally the best movie known to man, only slightly better than the bee movie. Godbless sony (/s)
